message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner stages describe the development of sexual characteristics, with Tanner stage 2 indicating the onset of puberty. Thelarche is the development of breast buds and is a sign of Tanner stage 2, while adrenarche refers to the development of pubic and axillary hair and is not specific to a particular stage. Pubarche also refers to the development of pubic hair but is more specific to Tanner stage 3, and coarse pubic hair is not a specific sign of any particular Tanner stage.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner staging is a method of assessing sexual development in children. Tanner stage 2 is characterized by thelarche, or the onset of breast development. Adrenarche refers to the development of pubic hair, while pubarche refers to the growth of pubic and axillary hair. Coarse pubic hair is not specific to any Tanner stage.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner stage 2 is characterized by breast development, also known as thelarche. Adrenarche refers to the onset of adrenal androgen production, while pubarche refers to the onset of pubic hair growth. Coarse pubic hair is not a criterion for Tanner stage 2.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner stage 2 is characterized by thelarche, or the onset of breast development. Adrenarche refers to the maturation of the adrenal gland, while pubarche refers to the onset of pubic hair growth. Coarse pubic hair is not a specific marker for Tanner stage 2.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner stages describe the development of secondary sexual characteristics. Tanner stage 2 is characterized by the onset of breast development, known as thelarche. Adrenarche refers to the onset of androgen production, which leads to the growth of pubic hair (pubarche) and other secondary sexual characteristics. Coarse pubic hair is not a specific marker of any Tanner stage.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner staging is a system of physical measurements used to track human development. In females, Tanner stage 2 is marked by the onset of breast development, known as Thelarche. Adrenarche is the onset of adrenal androgen production, which is not related to sexual development. Pubarche refers to the onset of pubic hair growth, which is also seen in Tanner stage 2, but coarse pubic hair is not specifically mentioned as a sign of this stage.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner stage 2 is the onset of puberty and is characterized by breast development (thelarche) and enlargement of the areola. Adrenarche and pubarche refer to the development of pubic hair, but Tanner stage 2 specifically refers to the initial appearance of pubic hair as long, slightly pigmented, and straight or only slightly curled. Coarse pubic hair is more characteristic of later Tanner stages.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner stages are used to define the development of secondary sexual characteristics in both boys and girls. Tanner stage 2 is characterized by the onset of breast development, also known as thelarche. Adrenarche is the onset of adrenal androgen secretion, and pubarche is the onset of pubic hair growth. Coarse pubic hair is not an official defining characteristic of Tanner stage 2.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner stages describe the development of secondary sexual characteristics in adolescents. Tanner stage 2 is characterized by the onset of breast development (thelarche) and pubic hair growth, but the pubic hair is still fine and straight (not coarse). Adrenarche refers to the development of underarm hair, while pubarche refers to pubic hair growth.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Tanner staging is used to assess adolescent sexual development. Tanner stage 2 is characterized by thelarche, or the appearance of breast buds. Adrenarche refers to the onset of increased adrenal androgen secretion, which typically occurs earlier than thelarche. Pubarche is the appearance of pubic hair, but coarse pubic hair is not specific to Tanner stage 2.
